issue.title: [C++] Add backpressure to TPC-H dbgen
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16087](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16087). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
So that we don't OOM when generating large scale factors

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16087?focusedCommentId=17565803) by @toddfarmer:*
This issue was last updated over 90 days ago, which may be an indication it is no longer being actively worked. To better reflect the current state, the issue is being unassigned. Please feel free to re-take assignment of the issue if it is being actively worked, or if you plan to start that work soon.
